text: The PR2 men's single sculls competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Mondan 26 August 2019 || 10:24 || Heats |- | Wednesday 28 August 2019 || 09:46 || Repechage |- | rowspan=2|Friday 30 August 2019 || 10:15 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 13:20 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Central European Summer Time] (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== Heat winners advanced directly to the A final. The remaining boats were sent to the repechage. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rower !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Jeremy Hall | align="left"| | 8:52.35 | FA |- | 2 | align="left"|Daniele Stefanoni | align="left"| | 9:12.36 | R |- | 3 | align="left"|Jorge Pineda | align="left"| | 9:57.14 | R |- | 4 | align="left"|Leopold Reimann | align="left"| | 10:00.18 | R |} ====Heat 2==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rower !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Corne de Koning | align="left"| | 8:59.82 | FA |- | 2 | align="left"|Isaac French | align="left"| | 9:46.84 | R |- | 3 | align="left"|Gavin Foulsham | align="left"| | 9:56.57 | R |- | 4 | align="left"|Fei Tianming | align="left"| | 11:30.26 | R |} ===Repechage=== The four fastest boats advanced to the A final. The remaining boats were sent to the B final. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Rower !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Daniele Stefanoni | align="left"| | 9:08.19 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Isaac French | align="left"| | 9:17.44 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 3 | align="left"|Jorge Pineda | align="left"| | 9:28.09 | FA |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 4 | align="left"|Gavin Foulsham | align="left"| | 9:30.96 | FA |- | 5 | align="left"|Leopold Reimann | align="left"| | 9:42.69 | FB |- | 6 | align="left"|Fei Tianming | align="left"| | 10:56.44 | FB |} ===Finals=== The A final determined the rankings for places 1 to 6. Additional rankings were determined in the B final. ====Final B==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rower !Country !Time |- | 1 | align="left"|Leopold Reimann | align="left"| | 9:40.98 |- | 2 | align="left"|Fei Tianming | align="left"| | 10:33.06 |} ====Final A==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rower !Country !Time |- | | align="left"|Corne de Koning | align="left"| | 8:42.78 |- | | align="left"|Jeremy Hall | align="left"| | 8:47.44 |- | | align="left"|Daniele Stefanoni | align="left"| | 9:11.55 |- | 4 | align="left"|Jorge Pineda | align="left"| | 9:26.88 |- | 5 | align="left"|Isaac French | align="left"| | 9:29.96 |- | 6 | align="left"|Gavin Foulsham | align="left"| | 9:32.67 |} ==References== Category:2019 World Rowing Championships
title: 2019 World Rowing Championships – PR2 Men's single sculls
